summary: WHILE DRIVING AT 45 MPH AN ALARM SOUNDED WARNING THE CONSUMER TO CHECK THE INSTRUMENT PANEL.  OIL PRESSURE GAUGE REGISTERED VERY LOW OIL PRESSURE.  CONSUMER CHECKED THE OIL LEVEL WITH THE DIP STICK AND FOUND IT TO BE UP TO PAR.   DEALER EXAMINED THE VEHICLE, AND FOUND A SLUDGE BUILD UP IN THE ENGINE.  A NEW ENGINE WAS NEEDED.  *AK
